title: Web Developer
job_overview:
HIRING: WordPress Web Developer (Full-Time, Remote - Philippines | Part-Time | Competitive Salary

We’re looking for a talented WordPress Web Developer to join our growing team! If you can build clean, responsive websites and know how to create email capture pop-ups that — we want to hear from you!

Requirements:
2+ years of WordPress development
Strong HTML, CSS, JS, PHP skills
Experience with email pop-ups and integrations (e.g., Mailchimp, MailerLite)
Familiar with Elementor, WPBakery, or Gutenberg
WooCommerce & plugin experience
Mobile-first + SEO-focused design skills
Great communication & reliable internet
Tools We Use:
WordPress, Elementor, Mailchimp, Google Workspace, Trello, Slack



Resume/CV
Portfolio 
No portfolio = No interview.
We're looking for gig work that will turn into long-term teaUpgrade to see actual infombers ready to grow with us!
